One of our best meals in Barcelona.  I do think it depends on what you order here.  We stuck with Iberian Pork Ribs and paella and they were excellent.  The pork was a huge portion and when it was sat down in front of us we were a little overwhelmed but we ended up eating the whole thing because it was so tender and flavorful.  We really enjoyed our meal here but I can say I think the service isnt the best and we had to really work to get drinks refilled and so on but this was still a really enjoyable experience.  Sometimes its what you make of it not the servers.
